info1describe: is an activity for students and students with technology skills to "come try" to present ideas for solving problems for the world and our society, specifically solving the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the United Nation (UN). Participants will receive expert advice including technology and SGDs, key elements of their portfolio and skills in a portfolio of knowledge performance within Talk Sessions by Google's research team to share experiences and transfers. Basic knowledge solves everyone's work.
